summary: Late '50s to early '60s, when the space war between the Soviet and US was fiercely going on, a fifteen-year-old member of the communist party, Luciana, develops her ideals while living with... See full summary »
cast: Miriana Raschillà|Pietro Del Giudice|Michelangelo Ciminale|Chiara Arrighi|Valentino Campitelli|Claudia Pandolfi|Sergio Rubini|Susanna Nicchiarelli|Angelo Orlando|Giorgia De Andreis|Pietro Baroni|Giacomo Passarelli|Ottavia Pugliese|Kevin Durazzi|Luciano Scarpa|Roberto Di Palma|Allice Rosati|Brenda Galliani|Elvisa D'Orazio|Clemente Bicocchi|Lorenzo Autorino|Matteo Polci|Danilo Sarappa|Lucio Patané|Susanna Sportelli|Viviana Grande|Carlotta Decorato|Arabella Kramer|Nicola Guida|Bernardo Ferrara|Flavio Nuccitelli|Neil Armstrong|Yuri Gagarin|Nikita Khrushchev|Valentina Tereshkova|German Titov|David Maria Putorti
title: Cosmonauta
